title: Can French romance and rebellion defy dominant Red Roses?
summary: France have come closer than any other team during England's record run of victories. Beating the tournament hosts in the World Cup semi-final would be the ultimate heist.

title: Shock as USA crash out of 4x400m relay but GB through to final
summary: Olympic champions the USA  fail to qualify for the men's 4x400m relay final after a baton blunder but Great Britain's quartet make it through.

title: Tokyo warm-up facilities 'not perfect' - Coe
summary: World Athletics president Lord Coe says facilities in Tokyo are "not perfect" after complaints about the location of the warm-up track.

title: Euros backheel and vineyard dreams - Russo in her own words
summary: England forward Alessia Russo sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about her football career and her family.

title: Not even the Pope could persuade me to change tactics - Amorim
summary: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says not even the Pope could persuade him to change his controversial formation.
